3 namespace Ubiquity\translation;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\translation\loader\ArrayLoader;
6 use Ubiquity\log\Logger;
7 
14 class TranslatorManager {
15  protected static $locale;
16  protected static $loader;
17  protected static $catalogues;
18  protected static $fallbackLocale;
19 
20  protected static function transCallable($callback, $id, array $parameters = array(), $domain = null, $locale = null) {
21  if (null === $domain) {
22  $domain = 'messages';
23  }
24  $id = ( string ) $id;
25  $catalogue = self::getCatalogue ( $locale );
26  if ($catalogue === false) {
27  if (isset ( self::$fallbackLocale ) && $locale !== self::$fallbackLocale) {
28  self::setLocale ( self::$fallbackLocale );
29  Logger::warn ( "Translation", "Locale " . $locale . " not found, set active locale to " . self::$locale );
30  return self::trans ( $id, $parameters, $domain, self::$locale );
31  } else {
32  Logger::error ( "Translation", "Locale not found, no valid fallbackLocale specified" );
33  return $id;
34  }
35  }
36  $transId = self::getTransId ( $id, $domain );
37  if (isset ( $catalogue [$transId] )) {
38  return $callback ( $catalogue [$transId], $parameters );
39  } elseif (self::$fallbackLocale !== null && $locale !== self::$fallbackLocale) {
40  Logger::warn ( "Translation", "Translation not found for " . $id . ". Switch to fallbackLocale " . self::$fallbackLocale );
41  return self::trans ( $id, $parameters, $domain, self::$fallbackLocale );
42  } else {
43  Logger::warn ( "Translation", "Translation not found for " . $id . ". in locales." );
44  return $id;
45  }
46  }
47 
48  protected static function replaceParams($trans, array $parameters = array()) {
49  foreach ( $parameters as $k => $v ) {
50  $trans = str_replace ( '%' . $k . '%', $v, $trans );
51  }
52  return $trans;
53  }
54 
55  protected static function getTransId($id, $domain) {
56  return $domain . "." . $id;
57  }
58 
59  protected static function assertValidLocale($locale) {
60  if (1 !== preg_match ( '/^[a-z0-9@_\\.\\-]*$/i', $locale )) {
61  throw new \InvalidArgumentException ( sprintf ( 'Invalid "%s" locale.', $locale ) );
62  }
63  }
64 
65  public static function start($locale = "en_EN", $fallbackLocale = null, $rootDir = null) {
66  self::$locale = $locale;
67  self::$fallbackLocale = $fallbackLocale;
68  self::setRootDir ( $rootDir );
69  }
70 
71  public static function setLocale($locale) {
72  self::assertValidLocale ( $locale );
73  self::$locale = $locale;
74  }
75 
76  public static function setRootDir($rootDir = null) {
77  if (! isset ( $rootDir )) {
78  $rootDir = \ROOT . \DS . "translations";
79  }
80  self::$loader = new ArrayLoader ( $rootDir );
81  }
82 
83  public static function getLocale() {
84  return self::$locale;
85  }
86 
87  public static function trans($id, array $parameters = array(), $domain = null, $locale = null) {
88  return self::transCallable ( function ($catalog, $parameters) {
89  return self::replaceParams ( $catalog, $parameters );
90  }, $id, $parameters, $domain, $locale );
91  }
92 
93  public static function getCatalogue(&$locale = null) {
94  if (null === $locale) {
95  $locale = self::getLocale ();
96  } else {
97  self::assertValidLocale ( $locale );
98  }
99  if (! isset ( self::$catalogues [$locale] )) {
100  self::loadCatalogue ( $locale );
101  }
102  return self::$catalogues [$locale];
103  }
104 
105  public static function loadCatalogue($locale = null) {
106  self::$catalogues [$locale] = self::$loader->load ( $locale );
107  }
108 
113  public static function getFallbackLocale() {
114  return self::$fallbackLocale;
115  }
116 
121  public static function setFallbackLocale($fallbackLocale) {
122  self::$fallbackLocale = $fallbackLocale;
123  }
124 
125  public static function clearCache() {
126  self::$loader->clearCache ( '*' );
127  }
128 }
